update telegram_user set joinGame = joinGame + 1 where telegram_id = #{telegram_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update telegram_user set exitGame = exitGame + 1 where telegram_id = #{telegram_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update telegram_user set fraction = fraction + #{fraction,jdbcType=INTEGER} where telegram_id = #{telegram_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update telegram_user set language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where telegram_id = #{telegram_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
